recipes.label: Invite the Rector to a Salon
recipes.startdescription: Invite Reverend Timothy up to Hush House.
recipes.desc: Reverend Timothy is almost speechless with excitement... almost. [Timothy has sent a gift ahead.]

recipes.label: Invite the Blacksmith to Hush House
recipes.startdescription: Invite Denzil up to Hush House.
recipes.desc: Denzil inclines his head in thanks. [Denzil has sent a gift ahead.]

recipes.label: Invite the Killes to Hush House
recipes.startdescription: Invite the Killes up to Hush House.
recipes.desc: Mr Kille is clearly excited, and remains courteous. Mrs Kille is courteous, and may be excited: as ever, it's difficult to tell. [The Killes have sent a gift ahead.]

recipes.label: Not Just Now -
recipes.startdescription: [You can't invite Timothy to a Salon if you've already invited a villager or already held a Salon this Season.]
